forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain this morning. Breaks of sun this afternoon. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some passing clouds. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High around 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 44F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
